subject: Re: Adding Phone numbers into location condition pages - RRLW

full_threads.body:

Just confirming Ive checked and it seems like it is just Ryde that appears to have incorrect number but this is our main hub and we have advising going to these pages.

Can you please ensure the number is fixed to be 1800 518 180?

Thanks,

Hey Khemany,

Just a quick update - the phone numbers should now be displaying correctly.

Apologies for the earlier issue - that was part of the implementation process before we cleared the cache.

Everything should now look as expected, with the proper layout and details in place.

Feel free to check the pages again, and if anything still looks off, don’t hesitate to reach out.

Always happy to support!

Hey Khemany,

Thanks for the clarification—completely understood.

We’ll make sure the phone number only appears on the relevant location pages, not on the main stroke pillar page. Apologies again for the mix-up.

And yes, we can absolutely style the phone number in the same pill shape as the “Get In Touch” button—no problem at all.

Just let me know if you’re happy for us to go ahead with this setup, and we’ll get it moving.

Always happy to help!

action.text: Adriane Roa assigned to Adriane Roa

full_threads.body:
Hi Adrienna,

Thanks for your email.

I just want to be clear that this particular URL that you have included royalrehablifeworks.com.au/stroke would not be a page that we would need a phone number featured as this is a pillar page.

We would need the numbers to appear on the location pages for example:

Stroke Rehabilitation Program | Royal Rehab LifeWorks Cairns

Stroke Rehabilitation Ryde | Royal Rehab LifeWorks

I just want to be clear on this before making it live. Additionally will it be the same pill shape rather than the rectangle that I had in the screen shot?

Thanks,

Khemany

Marketing Manager
